semantic_description: Ensure the stored procedure name is captured as an attribute on database spans so that CLM Jaeger traces display both the database name and the sproc name.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the stored procedure name extracted from SqlCommand.CommandText when CommandType == StoredProcedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the database name associated with the current SqlConnection
